data.name: Alarm1
data.value: Well, do you want to kill the alarm?

data.name: Alarm2
data.value: Tech team... it's me... yes...

data.name: Alarm3
data.value: That's all. If you want to turn on again, please radio to tech team.

data.name: Alarm4
data.value: You sure? If you want to turn off, please radio to tech team.

data.name: Alarm5
data.value: Good luck, officer!

data.name: AlarmSelection1
data.value: Yes, I want to kill the alarm.

data.name: AlarmSelection2
data.value: No, it's not necessary.

data.name: Discuss1
data.value: Also worried about the hostages. ~y~Let's try to discuss with them~s~. How can I talk with them?

data.name: Discuss2
data.value: The technology team got ~b~robbers phone number~s~. Maybe we can use it.

data.name: Discuss3
data.value: OK, I'll try it.

data.name: Fight1
data.value: ~y~Let's fight to help all hostages and end this incident quickly.~s~

data.name: Fight2
data.value: Good. Don't worry. The SWAT units are already stand by.

data.name: Fight3
data.value: ~b~There are some gear in the back of the riot vans.~s~

data.name: Fight4
data.value: All rights, sir.

data.name: Final1
data.value: ~g~Thank you for your all of work!~s~

data.name: Final2
data.value: I will send you the operation report soon.

data.name: Final3
data.value: Good work today officer, ~g~thank you~s~.

data.name: Final4
data.value: Just doing my job, sir.

data.name: Intro1
data.value: Looks very bad, what's the situation?

data.name: Intro2
data.value: ~r~There are many robbers in the bank~s~, but we don't know how many they are.

data.name: Intro3
data.value: Well, are there any hostages?

data.name: Intro4
data.value: Yeah, they have ~y~8 hostages~s~ in the bank...

data.name: Intro5
data.value: We have two ways to solve this incident.

data.name: Intro6
data.value: First one is ~y~discussing with them~s~. They may stop this wrong activity.

data.name: Intro7
data.value: Second one is ~y~fighting with them~s~. We have SWAT units and ready.

data.name: Intro8
data.value: Which do you choose?

data.name: IntroSelection1
data.value: Try to discuss with them.

data.name: IntroSelection2
data.value: Fight to help all hostages.

data.name: MoveIn
data.value: ~g~Green light!~s~ Move in!

data.name: Negotiation11
data.value: Look, there are ~b~many officers~s~ around the bank. We want to end this incident ~g~peacefully~s~.

data.name: Negotiation111
data.value: ~b~Calm down~s~. We just want nobody to get hurt.

data.name: Negotiation1111
data.value: Can you say the same thing to your wife, ~b~{0}~s~ that you said to me?

data.name: Negotiation1112
data.value: Why do you know my wife!? ~r~Leave my family immediately!~s~

data.name: Negotiation112
data.value: ~r~Don't tell me anymore! You can't stop us!~s~

data.name: Negotiation1121
data.value: I'm sorry, but your action is ~r~wrong~s~.

data.name: Negotiation1122
data.value: You don't have to say sorry. I understand what you want to do.

data.name: Negotiation1123
data.value: But it's our problem. Bye, officer.

data.name: Negotiation1131
data.value: You are trying to save your family, but ~y~could the money you got make your family happy?~s~

data.name: Negotiation1133
data.value: ~y~Officer, what I should do? I can't think anymore... Why did I do...~s~

data.name: Negotiation1134
data.value: You only have to get out of the bank with your member.

data.name: Negotiation1135
data.value: Alright, officer. ~g~Thanks for making me think again.~s~

data.name: Negotiation12
data.value: ~r~Fuck you!~s~ Do you want to ~r~kill the hostages!?~s~ Or what?

data.name: Negotiation131
data.value: You will do that and all the cops in this city will come here!

data.name: Negotiation1311
data.value: Don't say things like that, or you might get a fight with a ~b~SWAT teams~s~.

data.name: Negotiation1312
data.value: ~r~Fuck you pig!~s~ You and everyone else are going to ~r~die~s~!

data.name: Negotiation132
data.value: ~r~And all hostages will be dead!~s~ Haha!

data.name: Negotiation1331
data.value: ~b~Don't you want to meet again your family?~s~ The hostages are probably thinking the same thing.

data.name: Negotiation1332
data.value: Of course I do... OK, we are coming out. ~y~Don't shoot please!~s~

data.name: Negotiation31
data.value: Well, what kind of deal do you give me?

data.name: Negotiation311
data.value: We are not going to end things ~g~peacefully~s~.

data.name: Negotiation321
data.value: We're interested in a free plane ticket to ~b~Liberty City~s~, first class!

data.name: Negotiation3211
data.value: You know that won't get approved right? ~b~Don't you want to see your family again?~s~

data.name: Negotiation3212
data.value: Of course I do. Alright, we are coming out, ~y~don't shoot!~s~

data.name: Negotiation3221
data.value: You are stupid? I said we need the airplane!

data.name: Negotiation3231
data.value: Officer, I'll tell you a good thing.

data.name: Negotiation3232
data.value: ~r~There is a lot of money in the bank!~s~ Hehe!

data.name: Negotiation331
data.value: I have no idea, but I'm sure we can still make a deal.

data.name: Negotiation332
data.value: You should better to start making any good deals soon then.

data.name: Negotiation333
data.value: But you don't have any idea, right? ~r~So you can't deal!~s~ lol

data.name: NegotiationSelection1
data.value: There are many officers.

data.name: NegotiationSelection10
data.value: Don't you want to meet again your family?

data.name: NegotiationSelection11
data.value: What are you interested in?

data.name: NegotiationSelection12
data.value: No idea.

data.name: NegotiationSelection13
data.value: Don't you want to see your family again?

data.name: NegotiationSelection14
data.value: Release the hostage first.

data.name: NegotiationSelection15
data.value: Give you a briefcase filled the money.

data.name: NegotiationSelection2
data.value: What do you want?

data.name: NegotiationSelection3
data.value: Can't we make a deal?

data.name: NegotiationSelection4
data.value: Calm down.

data.name: NegotiationSelection5
data.value: All the cops in this city will come here!

data.name: NegotiationSelection6
data.value: Can you say the same thing to your wife?

data.name: NegotiationSelection7
data.value: I'm sorry.

data.name: NegotiationSelection8
data.value: You are trying to save your familly, but...

data.name: NegotiationSelection9
data.value: Don't say things like that.

data.name: Phone1
data.value: What's up!? I'm ~r~busy~s~ now!

data.name: Phone2
data.value: I am the officer, who am I speaking to?

data.name: Phone3
data.value: ~r~Shut up!~s~ No time to speak with you!

data.name: Request1
data.value: We want a bus to take us to ~b~International Airport~s~.

data.name: Request11
data.value: What do you mean? ~y~The bus won't come?~s~

data.name: Request12
data.value: Please wait. It needs time to come to the bus here...

data.name: Request13
data.value: ~r~I can't believe what you said.~s~

data.name: Request2
data.value: From there, we want a plane to fly us to ~b~Liberty City~s~.

data.name: Request21
data.value: ~r~Fuck you!~s~ You will come in after there are no hostages, won't you!?

data.name: Request211
data.value: ~y~The bus won't come if you don't release hostages~s~.

data.name: Request212
data.value: OKOK... Your brain is ~r~fucking shit!~s~

data.name: Request22
data.value: They come out when I see the bus!

data.name: Request220
data.value: Thank you too. ~y~Don't shoot my husband!~s~

data.name: Request221
data.value: I have your wife, ~b~{0}~s~. ~g~She wants to talk with you.~s~

data.name: Request222
data.value: Let me talk to her.

data.name: Request223
data.value: Wait for a moment, she is coming.

data.name: Request224
data.value: ~q~Baby! Please come out! Think again about our kids!~s~

data.name: Request225
data.value: ~q~Please! Stop doing such a thing!~s~

data.name: Request226
data.value: I'm sorry ~b~{0}~s~...

data.name: Request227
data.value: I really don't know why I'm here...

data.name: Request228
data.value: I love you ~b~{0}~s~! ~g~I'm coming out!~s~

data.name: Request229
data.value: Thank you, Mrs.~b~{0}~s~. For safety, please get back into a police car.

data.name: Request231
data.value: ~y~Release the hostages, now!~s~

data.name: Request31
data.value: I won't release hostages that easily.

data.name: Request32
data.value: This action is necessary to help my family.

data.name: Request33
data.value: ~r~But you won't understand forever.~s~

data.name: RequestSelection1
data.value: I'll try to work on it but I can't guarantee anything.

data.name: RequestSelection2
data.value: OK, we have a bus on the way, but you need to release the hostages first.

data.name: RequestSelection3
data.value: Release hostage now and I'll cut your sentences by 5 years.

data.name: RequestSelection4
data.value: The bus won't come here.

data.name: RequestSelection5
data.value: I have your wife.

data.name: RequestSelection6
data.value: Release the hostages!

data.name: RescueHostage
data.value: Come on! ~g~It's safe~s~, get to the ambulance outside!

data.name: SeemSurrender
data.value: The ~r~robbers~s~ seem to be surrendering. Get in position behind a ~b~police car~s~.

data.name: StillFighting
data.value: Go on! ~y~There are still hostages in there!~s~

data.name: Surrender1
data.value: ~g~Amaizing job~s~, officer! It seems the robbers were ~g~surrendered~s~!

data.name: Surrender2
data.value: Your job now is ~b~rescue all hostages from the bank~s~.

data.name: Surrender3
data.value: Please take care, ~y~you never know what the robbers left inside~s~.

data.name: Surrender4
data.value: We have no idea if there are still robbers inside.

data.name: Surrender5
data.value: All rights, sir.
